original_title: やっぱり、妻が好きだ！倦怠期だった僕ら夫婦 神宮寺ナオ
overview: The relationship between husband and wife was cold. 10 years married. We were together when we were young, and we had sex every day and loved each other. However, even though we live in the same house, we spend almost no time together. I know her wife has a sex friend. I used to go out with a young girl to comfort myself and try to look cool. But I still love my wife...if I still have the chance, I want to love her again. It flares up violently again... A dense and rich serious vaginal cum shot SEX between adult men and women.
title: After All, I Love My Wife! We, who Were Bored, Had Sex For The First Time In A Long Time… After All, we still Very Compatible. Jinguji Nao
